trans-unit.source: Must specify a port range
trans-unit.target: 必须指定端口范围

trans-unit.source: Must specify a port range as StartPort-EndPort
trans-unit.target: 必须将端口范围指定为 StartPort-EndPort

trans-unit.source: Start port must be lower then end port
trans-unit.target: 起始端口必须小于结束端口

trans-unit.source: Interactive programming for .NET.
trans-unit.target: .NET 的交互式编程。

trans-unit.source: Starts dotnet-interactive as a Jupyter kernel
trans-unit.target: 启动 dotnet-interactive 作为 Jupyter 内核

trans-unit.source: The path to a connection file provided by Jupyter
trans-unit.target: Jupyter 提供的连接文件路径

trans-unit.source: The default language for the kernel
trans-unit.target: 内核默认语言

trans-unit.source: Install the .NET kernel for Jupyter
trans-unit.target: 安装适用于 Jupyter 的 .NET 内核

trans-unit.source: Specifies the range of ports to use to enable HTTP services
trans-unit.target: 指定用于启用 HTTP 服务的端口范围

trans-unit.source: Installs the kernel specs to the specified directory
trans-unit.target: 将内核规格安装到指定目录

trans-unit.source: Enable file logging to the specified directory
trans-unit.target: 启用文档日志到指定目录

trans-unit.source: Starts a process to parse and serialize notebooks.
trans-unit.target: 启动分析和序列化笔记本的进程。

trans-unit.source: Starts dotnet-interactive with kernel functionality exposed over standard I/O
trans-unit.target: 使用通过标准 I/O 公开的内核功能启动 dotnet 交互

trans-unit.source: Specifies the port on which to enable HTTP services
trans-unit.target: 指定要在其中启用 HTTP 服务的端口

trans-unit.source: Cannot specify both {0} and {1} together
trans-unit.target: 无法同时指定 {0} 和 {1}

trans-unit.source: Must specify a port number or *.
trans-unit.target: 必须指定端口号或 *。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the range of ports to use to enable HTTP services
trans-unit.target: 指定用于启用 HTTP 服务的端口范围

trans-unit.source: Name of the kernel host.
trans-unit.target: 内核主机的名称。

trans-unit.source: Enable preview kernel features.
trans-unit.target: 启用预览内核功能。

trans-unit.source: Working directory to which to change after launching the kernel.
trans-unit.target: 启动内核后要更改的工作目录。

trans-unit.source: Enable verbose logging to the console
trans-unit.target: 启用详细记录至控制台

trans-unit.source: Show version and build information
trans-unit.target: 显示版本并生成信息
